strings.threeWFormDescription: The information you provide will be used to inform the operational planning and to communicate about our work. The numbers will be made public but your personal information will never be shared.
strings.supportedOperationDescription: If operation does not appear in the dropdown, the operation does not yet exist in GO. In that case, please submit a new Field Report to generate the operation, then come back to this form
strings.countryProvinceDescription: Select areas where activities reported in this form are occurring
strings.estimateDateDescriptionOne: Select the date when the work on the activity begins.
strings.estimateDateDescriptionTwo: The project status (planned and ongoing) is automatically defined by the entered dates. If there is no End Date, it can be left empty
strings.nationalSocietyInputDescription: Which RCRC actor (NS/IFRC/ICRC) is conducting the activity?
strings.contactInformationDescription: Who should be contacted for any coordination matters related to this response activity?
strings.eruDeployedDescription: Which ERU is conducting the response activity?
strings.actionTakenDescription: Select the actions that are being across all of the locations tagged above
strings.noteHeading: If you have any questions, contact the IM team
strings.messageHeading: You are about to submit your entry for 3W for
strings.messageEmergencyDescriptionTwo: Please review your selections below before submission.
